mapper.select: SELECT M.MOVIE_NUMBER, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, MV.MOVIE_PRICE, MV.MOVIE_POSTER FROM MEMBER M JOIN BASKET B ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = B.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN MOVIE MV ON B.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}

SELECT OH.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, OH.ORDER_HISTORY_TIME FROM MEMBER M JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = OH.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT OP ON OP.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER = OH.ORDER_HISTORY_NUMBER JOIN MOVIE MV ON OP.MOVIE_NUMBER = MV.MOVIE_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
